thread.title: Travel: Contraflow on A3 tonight
thread.title_full: Travel: Contraflow on A3 tonight | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Travel: Contraflow on A3 tonight
text:
Credit: ITV Meridian Road users in Surrey are being advised that the southbound A3 will be closed through the Hindhead Tunnel tonight, between 9pm and 6am, for technical repairs to signage.
A clearly signed diversion will be in place via a contraflow through the northbound tunnel.
Drivers planning to use this section of the A3 are advised to plan their journeys and allow extra time to reach their destinations.
Last updated Tue 28 Jul 2015 Travel
